pr_title: local athenz start and stop scripts

timeline.message: local athenz start and stop scripts

timeline.bodyText: Noticed your username (abvaidya) is part of the path. Is that intentional?
timeline.author: OferLevi85
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -110,3 +110,11 @@ clean: remove-all
 	docker image rm athenz-conf || true
 	docker image rm athenz-setup-env || true
 	docker image rm rdl-athenz-java-model || true
+
+remove-local: remove-all
+	docker image rm abvaidya/athenz-setup-env:1.9.22 || true

replies.bodyText: Yes. For now the docker images are uploaded to my personal docker account. Once we test it enough and agree , I can upload the same to Athenz docker account and change references to Athenz docker.
replies.author: abvaidya

replies.bodyText: why not use something like $USER instead?
replies.author: havetisyan

timeline.message:
adding a new config param to avoid etc/hosts entry

fix lint

timeline.bodyText: if this is a test image why have the other authorities? this might mislead others and use them as is and left behind the TestUserAuthority. If it's for local dev, then I expect TestUserAuthority should be the only one added.
timeline.author: havetisyan
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -9,7 +9,7 @@
 
 # Comma separated list of authority implementation classes to support
 # authenticating principals in ZMS
-athenz.zms.authority_classes=com.yahoo.athenz.auth.impl.PrincipalAuthority,com.yahoo.athenz.auth.impl.UserAuthority,com.yahoo.athenz.auth.oauth.OAuthCertBoundJwtAccessTokenAuthority,com.yahoo.athenz.auth.impl.CertificateAuthority
+athenz.zms.authority_classes=com.yahoo.athenz.auth.impl.PrincipalAuthority,com.yahoo.athenz.auth.impl.TestUserAuthority,com.yahoo.athenz.auth.oauth.OAuthCertBoundJwtAccessTokenAuthority,com.yahoo.athenz.auth.impl.CertificateAuthority

timeline.message:
removing ref to personal docker org and testuserauthority from prop

minor changes
